Text: However, there is a significant execution risk regarding its business plan and the macroeconomic environment has deteriorated further in the past two months due to increasing expectations of lower rates for longer in Europe, which has prompted the bank to slightly change its guidance of revenue target in 2022 from about €25 billion, to €24-25 billion.
Cause: However, there is a significant execution risk regarding its business plan and the macroeconomic environment has deteriorated further in the past two months due to increasing expectations of lower rates for longer in Europe
Effect: the bank to slightly change its guidance of revenue target in 2022 from about €25 billion, to €24-25 billion.
Sentence: <e1>However, there is a significant execution risk regarding its business plan and the macroeconomic environment has deteriorated further in the past two months due to increasing expectations of lower rates for longer in Europe</e1>, which has prompted <e2>the bank to slightly change its guidance of revenue target in 2022 from about €25 billion, to €24-25 billion.</e2>
